Yrel.name: Vindication
Yrel.description: Unleash holy energy around Yrel, dealing 42 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and healing her for 96 (+4% per level).  Charging up this Ability increases its damage up to 140 (+4% per level), and healing up to 320 (+4% per level).

Yrel.name: Righteous Hammer
Yrel.description: Swing Yrel's hammer, dealing 38 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of her and knocking them away.  Charging up this Ability increases its knockback distance, and damage up to 125 (+4% per level). Enemies hit at maximum charge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds.

Yrel.name: Avenging Wrath
Yrel.description: Leap to a location, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and Slowing them by 50% for 1 second.  Charging up this Ability increases its range.

Yrel.name: Ardent Defender
Yrel.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

Yrel.name: Sacred Ground
Yrel.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

Yrel.name: Divine Purpose
Yrel.description: Activate to instantly charge Yrel's next Basic Ability at no mana cost.  Passive: Yrel's Basic Abilities charge up over 1.5 seconds, increasing in effectiveness, but reducing Yrel's Movement Speed by 25%.

1.name: Light of Karabor
1.description: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Vindication's healing is increased by 20% per enemy Hero hit.

1.name: Dauntless
1.description: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 35 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

1.name: Maraad's Insight
1.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128 (+4% per level).

4.name: Aegis of Light
4.description: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 35 Armor for 5 seconds.

4.name: Gift of the Naaru
4.description: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275 (+4% per level).

4.name: Hand of Freedom
4.description: Grant an allied Hero 50% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.  Cannot be used on Yrel.

7.name: Righteous Momentum
7.description: Yrel is no longer slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and at maximum charge she gains 25% Movement Speed.

7.name: Holy Avenger
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

7.name: Divine Steed
7.description: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

7.name: Samaara's Light
7.description: While above 50% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

10.name: Ardent Defender
10.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

10.name: Sacred Ground
10.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 40 Armor until she leaves the area.

13.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 30% less damage for 3 seconds.

13.name: Repentance
13.description: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Velen's Chosen
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Templar's Verdict
16.description: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Divine Favor
16.description: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Wrath
16.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

20.name: Word of Glory
20.description: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

20.name: Hallowed Ground
20.description: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

20.name: Bubble Hearth
20.description: After 1 second, Yrel becomes Invulnerable and casts Hearthstone. Cannot be canceled.

20.name: Seraphim
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
